text:
e="preserve">Vladimir Vasilev Ivanov (, 23 April 1955 – 26 November 2020) was a Bulgarian sprinter. He was born in Sofia. He competed in 400 metres at the 1980 European Indoor Championships. At the 1980 Olympics he finished sixth.
Ivanov died from COVID-19-related problems in Sofia, Bulgaria on 26 November 2020, aged 65.
